channel.title: [508] Obelisk raises summoning level
channel.description:
I am having a problem. I cannot seem to find out how to make it to where if you click the summoning obelisk it raises your summoning level/gives xp. I saw it on another 508 server and I was wondering if anyone knew how to do it. Also.. I dont have a ::object command so in codeusa where would I spawn an object at? Thanks to anyone who helps.
Rep ++ To anyone who helps solve this.
